questions.question: What is the Pumping Lemma commonly used to analyze?

explanations.b: Correct! The Pumping Lemma is commonly used to analyze regular languages.

questions.question: What does the Pumping Lemma provide insight into regarding regular languages?

answers.a: It proves all regular languages are finite.
answers.b: It establishes the pumpability of regular languages.
answers.c: It guarantees the complexity of regular languages.
answers.d: It is irrelevant to regular languages.

explanations.b: Correct! The Pumping Lemma provides insight into the pumpability of regular languages.

questions.question: What type of languages does the Pumping Lemma specifically apply to?

explanations.c: Correct! The Pumping Lemma specifically applies to regular languages.
